text: Sos Sargsyan (24 October 1929 - 26 September 2013) was a famous Armenian actor, director, and writer. He was known for his roles in Guys from the Army Band, Solaris, and in Nahapet. Sargsyan was born on 24 October 1929 in Stepanavan, Soviet Armenia. He was raised in Yerevan, Armenia. Sargsyan died on 26 September 2013 in Yerevan, Armenia from a heart attack, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Armenian actors Category:Armenian movie directors Category:Armenian writers Category:People from Yerevan Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Sos Sargsyan
